thread.title: BRIEF-Altice unlikely to achieve net debt target Of 4X EBITDA in 2019

title: BRIEF-Altice unlikely to achieve net debt target Of 4X EBITDA in 2019
text: March 16, 2018 / 3:04 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Altice unlikely to achieve net debt target Of 4X EBITDA in 2019 Reuters Staff March 16 (Reuters) - Altice Europe: * ALTICE NV CEO SAYS TAKING ALTICE NV PRIVATE NOT ON OUR RADAR SCREEN * EUROPE CEO SAYS ALREADY SEEING SIGNIFICANT IMPROVEMENTS IN FIBRE, DSL CHURN IN FRANCE * EUROPE CEO SEES FRENCH CAPEX LOWER IN 2018 * CEO SAYS INTERMEDIATE FRENCH CHURN TARGET MID-TEENS, LONGER TERM BELOW 10 PERCENT * CEO SAYS CONFIDENT OF MAKING MONEY FROM SPORTS RIGHTS ON FRENCH PREMIUM TV * CEO SAYS UNLIKELY TO ACHIEVE NET DEBT TARGET OF 4X EBITDA IN 2019 Further company coverage: (Reporting By Georgina Prodhan)
